original_text: The anger of the Lord burned against Israel so that he sold them into the hands of Cushan-Rishathaim king of Aram Naharaim, to whom the Israelites were subject for eight years.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하사 그들을 메소보다미아 왕 구산 리사다임의 손에 팔았으므로 이스라엘 자손이 구산 리사다임을 팔 년 동안 섬겼더니

sentences.original_text: The anger of the Lord burned against Israel
into the hands of Cushan-Rishathaim king of Aram Naharaim
sentences.korean_translation: 아람 나하라임의 왕 구산 리사다임의 손에

sentences.original_text: to whom the Israelites were subject
